mercury.name: Mercury
mercury.description: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun and has a very thin atmosphere.

venus.name: Venus
venus.description: Venus is known for its thick and toxic atmosphere, making it extremely hot.

earth.name: Earth
earth.description: Earth is the only known planet to support life and has abundant water.

mars.name: Mars
mars.description: Mars is known for its red appearance and is a target for future human exploration.

jupiter.name: Jupiter
jupiter.description: Jupiter is the largest planet and has a strong magnetic field.

saturn.name: Saturn
saturn.description: Saturn is known for its beautiful ring system.

uranus.name: Uranus
uranus.description: Uranus is unique for its extreme axial tilt, making it appear to roll on its side.

neptune.name: Neptune
neptune.description: Neptune is a distant ice giant and has a strong blue color due to methane in its atmosphere.
